item.title: Electronic Arts gets a downgrade from Raymond James after video game maker's guidance cut
item.description: Raymond James is stepping to the sidelines on Electronic Arts after the video game maker cut its full-year guidance.

item.title: These are the 2 stocks that will win the most from Trump's AI project Stargate, analysts say
item.description: President Donald Trump's Stargate foray could present a major boon for these technology companies, according to Wall Street.

item.title: A power stock getting a Trump boost has more room to run, according to the charts
item.description: Todd Gordon breaks down the charts in Vistra.

item.title: Goldman Sachs is bullish on this little-known software company
item.description: This company is a leader in a growing market, per Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Piper Sandler downgrades Boston Beer after disappointing Hard Mountain Dew rollout
item.description: Piper Sandler is lowering its growth targets on Boston Beer after a recent disappointing launch of Hard Mountain Dew.
